yesha_locsync_v1.studio_name: The Loc Repair Clinic at U Natural Hair
yesha_locsync_v1.hours_string: Sunday through Friday, 11 AM to 7 PM
yesha_locsync_v1.greeting_tts: Thanks for calling the Loc Repair Clinic. How can I help you today?
pricing_notes: Interlock starts at $95 for 2–3 turns, $135 for 4–6 turns

canonical_answers.q: How can I get an appointment?
canonical_answers.a: We serve by appointment only. You can book immediately at our online portal.
Interlock maintenance starts at $95 for 2–3 turns, and $135 for 4–6 turns. A consultation and deposit are required. Start your quote at our portal.

canonical_answers.q: How can I get bald coverage?
canonical_answers.a: If you live in Metro Detroit, you're eligible for a consultation. Text COVERAGE to our number to get started.
We're open Sunday through Friday, 11 AM to 7 PM. We're closed Saturdays.

overrides.reply: We're appointment-only. You can book online right now for slots as early as tomorrow at our portal.

example_maintenance_salon.hours_string: Tuesday through Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM
example_maintenance_salon.greeting_tts: Thanks for calling Natural Loc Maintenance Studio. How can I help you?
pricing_notes: Pricing varies by loc length and density
policies: Credit card required to hold appointments

canonical_answers.q: How can I get an appointment?
canonical_answers.a: Visit our online booking system to see available times and book your maintenance appointment.
Maintenance starts at $80 depending on your loc length and density. Book a consultation through our portal for exact pricing.
We're open Tuesday through Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM.
